title: The Walt Disney Company
description: The Walt Disney Company's brand colors embody a magical and family-friendly theme. The mix of blue (hex 113CCF) heralds a sense of trust and creativity, traditionally known for capturing the imagination, while the white (hex FFFFFF) represents purity and innocence. The light blue (hex BFF5FD) conveys serenity and joy, often used to highlight the brand's approachable and whimsical nature. These colors are iconic and prominently seen across Disney's branding and merchandising, providing a universal visual language that is immediately recognizable and endearing to audiences worldwide.
